Posts.EditableText: I was playing and editing a quest about an hour ago, now I get 404 for both edit and play... why?
Posts.HTML: I was playing and editing a quest about an hour ago, now I get 404 for both edit and play... why?

Posts.EditableText: Could be a temporary glitch on the server. Try going back to the page with your list of games on, refresh the page, and then see if it works. If not, you might need to speak to one of the site admins.
Posts.HTML: Could be a temporary glitch on the server. Try going back to the page with your list of games on, refresh the page, and then see if it works. If not, you might need to speak to one of the site admins.
